name: structNew
description:
Creates a new, empty structure. The shorthand syntax for an empty unordered struct is `{}`. You can also use the syntax `{"key":"value"}` to initialize it with values. The shorthand syntax for an ordered struct is `[:]` or `[=]`. The shorthand for a case-sensitive struct is `${}`.The shorthand for a ordered and casesensitive struct is `$[=]`.
NOTE: To preserve the case of the struct key, place quotes around it, otherwise it will be converted to uppercase.

params.name: type
params.description:
CF2016+ Lucee4.5+ If set to `ordered` the order in which elements are added to the structure will be maintained. In Lucee `linked` can be used in place of `ordered`.
CF2021+ If set to `casesensitive` the keys will remain case-sensitive. Additionally, `ordered-casesensitive` can be used to create an ordered case-sensitive struct.

params.name: sortType
params.description: CF2016u3+ Sort types are text or numeric.

params.name: sortOrder
params.description: CF2016u3+ The order of the sort (ascending or descending).

params.name: localeSensitive
params.description: CF2016u3+ Specify if you wish to do a locale sensitive sorting.

params.name: callback
params.description: CF2016u3+ A comparator function used to sort new data entered into the structure. Returns 1, 0 or -1.

coldfusion.notes: CF2016 added ordered structs. CF2016u3 added sorted structs. CF2018 added named parameters. CF2021 added 2 new types: ordered-casesensitive & casesensitive.

links.title: Structures
links.description: A description of CFML Structures from Ortus' Learn Modern ColdFusion <CFML> in 100 Minutes.

examples.title: New struct using literal notation
examples.code:
unordered = { a=1, c=3, b=2 };
writeDump( unordered );

examples.title: New struct using function
New ordered struct using literal notation
examples.description: CF2016+ Creates an ordered struct. Note the square brackets.
examples.code:
ordered = [ a=1, b=2, c=3 ];
writeDump( ordered );

examples.title: New ordered struct using function
examples.description: CF2016+ Lucee4.5+ Creates an ordered struct.

examples.title: New ordered struct using literal notation
examples.description: CF2016+ Lucee5+ Creates an ordered struct.

examples.title: New case-sensitive struct using function
New case-sensitive struct using literal notation
New ordered and case-sensitive struct using function
New ordered and case-sensitive struct using literal notation
examples.description: CF2021+ Creates an ordered and case-sensitive struct.
